thread.title_full: 'Judwaa 2' first look: Check out Varun Dhawan's 'tapori' and 'geeky' avatars - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Judwaa 2' first look: Check out Varun Dhawan's 'tapori' and 'geeky' avatars
text:
Exclusive #Judwaa2 sept29. Raja and Prem. @taapsee @Asli_Jacqueline @NGEMovies . #firstlook .whose your pick? pic.twitter.com/pvzclXWu9N 
â€” VarunBadrinathdhawan (@Varun_dvn) February 7, 2017 The much-awaited first look of Varun Dhawan's upcoming Bollywood film 'Judwaa 2' is out! 'Geeky' or 'tapori' - Which avatar of the actor do you like more? Tell us in comments below!
Filmmaker Sajid Nadiadwala earlier confirmed that Salman Khan and Karisma Kapoor will make a special appearance in 'Judwaa 2'.
The reports of the original 'Judwaa' stars making a cameo in the upcoming reboot have been doing the rounds since the film was announced with Varun Dhawan in the lead role.
Apart from Varun in a double role, the movie stars Taapsee Pannu and Jacqueline Fernandez as female leads. David Dhawan, who helmed the 1997 blockbuster, will be directing the project scheduled to release on September 29, 2017.
